identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description:
Single identifier provided by the supplier for an object on which the
line item is based and is not considered a universal identity. Examples
include a subscription number, telephone number, meter point, etc.
Utilize the label property to provide a description of the identifier.

period.title: Period
period.description: A period of time relevant to when the service or item is delivered.

order.title: Order Reference
order.description: Order reference for a specific line within a purchase order provided by the buyer.

cost.title: Cost Reference
cost.description: Buyer accounting reference cost code to associate with the line.

item.title: Item
item.description: Details about the item, service or good, that is being sold

breakdown.title: Breakdown
breakdown.description:
Breakdown of the line item for more detailed information. The sum of all lines
will be used for the item price.

sum.title: Sum
sum.description: Result of quantity multiplied by the item's price (calculated)

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: Map of taxes to be applied and used in the invoice totals

total.title: Total
total.description: Total line amount after applying discounts to the sum (calculated).

substituted.title: Substituted
substituted.description:
List of substituted lines. Useful for deliveries or corrective documents in order
to indicate to the recipient which of the requested lines are being replaced.
This is for purely informative purposes, and will not be used for calculations.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description:
Set of specific notes for this line that may be required for
clarification.

Line.description: Line is a single row in an invoice.

key.title: Key
key.description:
Key for grouping or identifying charges for tax purposes. A suggested list of
keys is provided, but these are for reference only and may be extended by
the issuer.

code.title: Code
code.description: Reference or ID for this charge defined by the issuer

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Text description as to why the charge was applied

base.title: Base
base.description: Base for percent calculations instead of the line's sum

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percentage of base or parent line's sum

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description:
Quantity of units to apply the charge to when using the rate instead of
the line's quantity.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Unit to associate with the quantity when using the rate.

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: Rate defines a price per unit to use instead of the percentage.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Fixed or resulting charge amount to apply (calculated if percent present).

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description: Extension codes that apply to the charge

LineCharge.description: LineCharge represents an amount added to the line, and will be applied before taxes.

anyOf.title: Bonus for works ahead of schedule

key.title: Key
key.description: Key for identifying the type of discount being applied.

code.title: Code
code.description: Code or reference for this discount defined by the issuer

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Text description as to why the discount was applied

base.title: Base
base.description: Base for percent calculations instead of the line's sum.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percentage to apply to the base or line sum to calculate the discount amount

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Fixed discount amount to apply (calculated if percent present)

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description: Extension codes that apply to the discount

LineDiscount.description: LineDiscount represents an amount deducted from the line, and will be applied before taxes.

identifier.description:
Single identifier provided by the supplier for an object on which the
line item is based and is not considered a universal identity. Examples
include a subscription number, telephone number, meter point, etc.
Utilize the label property to provide a description of the identifier.

period.title: Period
period.description: A period of time relevant to when the service or item is delivered.

order.title: Order Reference
order.description: Order reference for a specific line within a purchase order provided by the buyer.

cost.title: Cost Reference
cost.description: Buyer accounting reference cost code to associate with the line.

item.title: Item
item.description: Details about the item, service or good, that is being sold

sum.title: Sum
sum.description: Result of quantity multiplied by the item's price (calculated)

total.title: Total
total.description: Total sub-line amount after applying discounts to the sum (calculated).

notes.title: Notes
notes.description:
Set of specific notes for this sub-line that may be required for
clarification.

SubLine.description: SubLine provides a simplified line that can be embedded inside other lines to provide a more detailed breakdown of the items being sold or substituted.
